body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.27 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for multisampling in Direct3D.
New version of the Gecko engine.
Improvements to the network proxy handling.
Better write support in MSXML.
Side-by-side manifests for built-in libraries.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
